DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of AZD1236 in patients with cystic fibrosis (CF) on inflammatory biomarkers in induced sputum, after a treatment period of 4 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess Efficacy of AZD1236 in Patients With Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.criteria: Provision of informed consent prior to any study specific procedures Have a clinical diagnosis of cystic fibrosis with an FEV1 >40% of predicted normal Be able to comply with induced sputum procedure postmenopausal surgically sterile female (total hysterectomy and /or bilateral total oophorectomy) Concomitant diagnosis of significant pulmonary disease other than CFrelated lung disease, including symptomatic asthma and allergic bronchopulmonary aspergillosis Treatment with any immunomodulatory agents within 8 weeks prior to Visit 2 Known to be infected with Burkholderia cepacia
